      • PRECEDENCE

        private static final int[] PRECEDENCE
        The precedence of the operators, matches order in OPERATORS. The order of precedence for of operators is as follows: Collation-related bracket symbols [==] [::] [..] Escaped characters \ Character set (bracket expression) [] Grouping () Single-character-ERE duplication * + ? {m,n} Concatenation -- will need to insert some arbitrary character to use for concat â€¢ (bullet symbol - not within the 128 ascii we're suporting.) Anchoring ^$ Alternation |
